noun.description: A loud, unpleasant, and prolonged noise.
examples: the fans made an awful din

verb.description: Make (someone) learn or remember something by constant repetition.
examples: the doctrine that has been dinned into all our heads

verb.description: Make a loud, unpleasant, and prolonged noise.
examples: the sound dinning in my ears was the telephone ringing

origin: Early 20th century: acronym from Deutsche Industrie-Norm German Industrial Standard (as laid down by the Deutsches Institut f√ºr Normung German Institute for Standards).
